title: Cricktor
author: Cricktor
content: Despite numerous daily dust or sometimes a few thousand sats dumped to the legacy address of the Genesis block, today some entity transfered a whopping 2.6236284BTC as "donation" to address 1A1zP1eP5QGefi2DMPTfTL5SLmv7DivfNa, or whatever the intention was for such an amount.Tx: 416fcc3f798e9c264384f7c6e2d9db459b4c1d84d4f13c7fcc6e673b7753fcc6I've a hard time not to judge such a sort of obscene transaction. How much good could've been done with such an amount in many countries of this world?I don't get it why people do this, be it countless small and the few huge amounts of recent time. The "countless" small dust coins bloat the UTXO set, the larger or huge transfers are what exactly? A show off of the filthy rich? I don't know... what's your opinion?Past huge recent transfers to 1A1zP1eP5QGefi2DMPTfTL5SLmv7DivfNa (more or equal to 1 Bitcoin):Amount in BTC   Confirmed (UTC)   Tx2.62362840   2025-03-14 08:25:43   416fcc3f798e9c264384f7c6e2d9db459b4c1d84d4f13c7fcc6e673b7753fcc626.91679286   2024-01-05 19:00:04   d7db4f96a4059c8906b953677ce533493d7b9da0f854a21b99f5772910dd0a314.00000000   2023-01-08 12:03:27   6805b175260c47549995c3ff19c3c51596651c26269e9f1b31c243986433a0b71.00000000   2019-07-02 02:43:26   1fa65db48d8cd650a82dbeb3976181e328e1e506821d389ae5a4f660970840c5

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: Cricktor on March 14, 2025, 08:09:01 PMDespite numerous daily dust or sometimes a few thousand sats dumped to the legacy address of the Genesis block, today some entity transfered a whopping 2.6236284BTC as "donation" to address 1A1zP1eP5QGefi2DMPTfTL5SLmv7DivfNa, or whatever the intention was for such an amount.Tx: 416fcc3f798e9c264384f7c6e2d9db459b4c1d84d4f13c7fcc6e673b7753fcc6I've a hard time not to judge such a sort of obscene transaction. How much good could've been done with such an amount in many countries of this world?I don't get it why people do this, be it countless small and the few huge amounts of recent time. The "countless" small dust coins bloat the UTXO set, the larger or huge transfers are what exactly? A show off of the filthy rich? I don't know... what's your opinion?There's no explanation for such decisions other than the personal desires of the coin owner. There may be those who enjoy seeing the transfer address on BlockGenesis or those who want to thank Satoshi. Often, we're unable to explain everything according to our own logic, so our minds are surprised by things they're not used to thinking about, or things we once thought were unthinkable or pointless. I agree with the post above, which indicated that there's no reason to be surprised by such news because sending dust to BlockGenesis is a million times better than spending it on wars and killing. At the same time, I don't deny that I hope we'll one day get to know these donators and let them offer us their perspective. In any case, whatever their reasons and motives, they are legitimate, and no one has the right to oppose or criticize them in any way that offends their owner.

comments.author: FinneysTrueVision
comments.body: The amount of outputs in the payment, mostly of smaller value, looks like it might be a faucet paying out various customers. The smallest outputs are for 30,000 sats, which happens to be the minimum withdrawal amount allowed by FreeBitco.in. As many might already be aware, this website has had all sorts of problems lately. It’s just a theory that they were involved, but looking at all the strange things happening with them recently, it wouldn’t be too surprising.
